commits.author: Grant Ingersoll
commits.sourceNew: /** * Informs the {@link IndexSchema} provided by the schema * parameter of an event (e.g., a new {@link FieldType} was added, etc. * * @param schema * The {@link IndexSchema} instance that inform of the update to. * * @since SOLR-1131 */ public void inform(IndexSchema schema);
